snippet: England captain Dylan Hartley has let himself, his club Northampton and his country down, head coach Eddie Jones has said, after the New Zealand-born hooker was banned for six weeks for striking an opponent....
lead_paragraph: England captain Dylan Hartley has let himself, his club Northampton and his country down, head coach Eddie Jones has said, after the New Zealand-born hooker was banned for six weeks for striking an opponent.

headline.main: Hartley Has Let Himself, Club and Country Down-Jones
headline.print_headline: Hartley Has Let Himself, Club and Country Down-Jones
